Articles.Content:
Hi, I just started a Youtube tutorial series that will eventually become a full on KERBAL SPACE PROGRAM. I start from the beginning an work my way up. I'm trying to build my fan base so I can start getting requests and suggestions on things. I plan to be very interactive and hope to join in this awesome community!

Here's the link!

http://www.youtube.com/user/dooooces

Sorry about the first few videos, I am new to recording but they get much better after the first couple

See you next time!

Dooooces
